summary: On a plane trip, Charlie Chan and the passengers are drugged, and when they wake up a quarter million dollars is missing.
cast: Roland Winters|Keye Luke|Mantan Moreland|Noel Neill|Tim Ryan|Iris Adrian|Elena Verdugo|Milburn Stone|Lyle Talbot|Paul Maxey|Joel Marston|John Eldredge|Eddie Parks|Louise Franklin|Ivan Bell|Frank Cady|Bob Curtis|George Eldredge|Suzette Harbin|George Hoagland|Edna Holland|Charles Jordan|Lyle Latell|William J. O'Brien|Frank O'Connor|Steve Pendleton|Lee Phelps|Cosmo Sardo|Emmett Vogan|Joe Whitehead
title: The Sky Dragon
